languages.text: "Она превратилась в царство смерти. Расправы над несогласными, гонения на коррумпированных торговцев, преследование инакомыслящих — все эти меры полезны и хороши в разумных пределах, я и сам ими пользовался. Однако госпожа Чорда давно эти пределы перешла".

"It's turned into a kingdom of death. Executing protesters, cracking down on corrupt traders, and suppressing dissent are all good, useful policies within reasonable limits. I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."
languages.original_text: "Она превратилась в царство смерти. Расправы над несогласными, гонения на коррумпированных торговцев, преследование инакомыслящих — все эти меры полезны и хороши в разумных пределах, я и сам ими пользовался. Однако госпожа Чорда давно эти пределы перешла".

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “这里已经变成了死亡的王国。我得说，无论是处决抗议者，打击腐败的商人，还是铲除异己，这些手段只要在合理范围内使用，都是相当不错的做法。老实说，我自己也用过这些手段。不过对库尔达女士而言，‘合理范围’这个词恐怕已经变成了遥远的回忆。”
languages.original_text: "It's turned into a kingdom of death. Executing protesters, cracking down on corrupt traders, and suppressing dissent are all good, useful policies within reasonable limits. I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."

traits.locale_text: “这里已经变成了死亡的王国。我得说，无论是处决抗议者，打击腐败的商人，还是铲除异己，这些手段只要在合理范围内使用，都是相当不错的做法。老实说，我自己也用过这些手段。不过对库尔达女士而言，‘合理范围’这个词恐怕已经变成了遥远的回忆。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「すっかり、死の王国になってしまった。抗議者を処刑したり、悪徳商人を取り締ったり。反対意見を弾圧しすること自体は、悪ではない。合理的な範囲内であれば、すべて有益だ。実際、私も使ったことがある。しかし、チョーダの支配は、合理的とは程遠い」
languages.original_text: "It's turned into a kingdom of death. Executing protesters, cracking down on corrupt traders, and suppressing dissent are all good, useful policies within reasonable limits. I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."

traits.locale_text: 「すっかり、死の王国になってしまった。抗議者を処刑したり、悪徳商人を取り締ったり。反対意見を弾圧しすること自体は、悪ではない。合理的な範囲内であれば、すべて有益だ。実際、私も使ったことがある。しかし、チョーダの支配は、合理的とは程遠い」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Se ha convertido en un reino de muerte. Ejecutar a los detractores, tomar medidas contra los comerciantes corruptos y reprimir la disidencia son políticas buenas y útiles dentro de unos límites razonables. De hecho, yo mismo las he empleado. Sin embargo, con Lady Chorda, los límites razonables son un recuerdo lejano».
languages.original_text: "It's turned into a kingdom of death. Executing protesters, cracking down on corrupt traders, and suppressing dissent are all good, useful policies within reasonable limits. I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha convertido en un reino de muerte. Ejecutar a los detractores, tomar medidas contra los comerciantes corruptos y reprimir la disidencia son políticas buenas y útiles dentro de unos límites razonables. De hecho, yo mismo las he empleado. Sin embargo, con Lady Chorda, los límites razonables son un recuerdo lejano».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Sie hat sich in ein Königreich des Todes verwandelt. Kritiker hinzurichten, gegen korrupte Händler vorzugehen und abweichende Meinungen zu unterdrücken, sind alles gute, nützliche Maßnahmen, innerhalb angemessener Grenzen. Ich habe sie selbst eingesetzt. Aber unter Lady Chorda sind angemessene Grenzen nur noch eine düstere Erinnerung."
languages.original_text: "It's turned into a kingdom of death. Executing protesters, cracking down on corrupt traders, and suppressing dissent are all good, useful policies within reasonable limits. I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hat sich in ein Königreich des Todes verwandelt. Kritiker hinzurichten, gegen korrupte Händler vorzugehen und abweichende Meinungen zu unterdrücken, sind alles gute, nützliche Maßnahmen, innerhalb angemessener Grenzen. Ich habe sie selbst eingesetzt. Aber unter Lady Chorda sind angemessene Grenzen nur noch eine düstere Erinnerung."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Cette station est devenue l'antichambre de la mort. Il est bon d'exécuter les protestataires, de sévir contre les marchands corrompus et d'éliminer le dissentiment, tant que ces pratiques sont appliquées dans les limites du raisonnable. Après tout, j'y ai eu recours moi-même. Cependant, avec dame Chorda, les limites du raisonnable ne sont plus qu'un lointain souvenir. »
languages.original_text: "It's turned into a kingdom of death. Executing protesters, cracking down on corrupt traders, and suppressing dissent are all good, useful policies within reasonable limits. I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."

traits.locale_text: « Cette station est devenue l'antichambre de la mort. Il est bon d'exécuter les protestataires, de sévir contre les marchands corrompus et d'éliminer le dissentiment, tant que ces pratiques sont appliquées dans les limites du raisonnable. Après tout, j'y ai eu recours moi-même. Cependant, avec dame Chorda, les limites du raisonnable ne sont plus qu'un lointain souvenir. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ölümün hâkim olduğu bir yere döndü. Protestocuları infaz etmek, yoz tacirlerin kökünü kazımak ve isyanları bastırmak anlaşılır şeyler. Belli sınırlar içinde faydaları olur. İşime yaradıkları durumlar oldu elbet. Ancak mevzubahis sınırlar aşılalı çok oluyor."
languages.original_text: "It's turned into a kingdom of death. Executing protesters, cracking down on corrupt traders, and suppressing dissent are all good, useful policies within reasonable limits. I've used them myself, in fact. However, with Lady Chorda, reasonable limits are a distant memory at this point."

traits.locale_text: "Ölümün hâkim olduğu bir yere döndü. Protestocuları infaz etmek, yoz tacirlerin kökünü kazımak ve isyanları bastırmak anlaşılır şeyler. Belli sınırlar içinde faydalıdır bunlar. İşime yaradıkları durumlar oldu elbet. Ancak mevzubahis sınırlar aşılalı çok oluyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
